Package dr.evomodel.sitemodel

Interface Summary
CategorySampleModel  
SiteModel SiteModel - Specifies how rates and substitution models vary across sites.
 

Class Summary
AlignmentScore  
CategoryParameterStatistic Performs test of whether a category parameter has a given minimum number of sites in each category
CategorySiteModel CategorySiteModel - A SiteModel that has a different rate for each category;
DirichletSiteModel DirichletSiteModel - A SiteModel that has a free rate parameter for each category.
DiscretizedLociRates  
GammaSiteBMA  
GammaSiteModel GammaSiteModel - A SiteModel that has a gamma distributed rates across sites.
PairDistance  
SampleQuantileLociRates  
SampleStateAndCategoryModel SampleStateAndCategoryModel - A SiteModel that has a discrete distribution of substitutionmodels over sites designed for sampling of rate categories.
SampleStateModel DiscreteSampleModel - A SiteModel that has a discrete distribution of substitutionmodels over sites designed for sampling of rate categories.
ScoreMatrix
